com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs

Class HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder

  • public class HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The builder used to create new appnet identity networks based on Hedera HCS DID method specification.

    • Constructor Summary

      HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder()

      • HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder

        public HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public HcsIdentityNetwork execute(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Client client)
                           throws com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException,
                                  com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException
        Creates a new identity network for the given appnet. This will initialize an address book file on Hedera File Service. Then DID and VC topics on Hedera network will be created unless already existing topics are provided.
        Parameters:
        client - Hedera client
        Returns:
        The new identity network.
        Throws:
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException - In case querying Hedera File Service fails.
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException - In case of querying Hedera File Service fails due to transport calls.

      • buildAndSignDidTopicCreateTransaction

        public HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder buildAndSignDidTopicCreateTransaction(java.util.function.Function<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.consensus.ConsensusTopicCreateTransaction,com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Transaction> builder)
        Creates and configures a new ConsensusTopicCreateTransaction for DID document messages topic in HCS. The transaction is not executed here, only upon calling execute method of the builder.
        Parameters:
        builder - The transaction builder that shall set all transaction properties, build and sign it.
        Returns:
        This identity network builder instance.

      • buildAndSignVcTopicCreateTransaction

        public HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder buildAndSignVcTopicCreateTransaction(java.util.function.Function<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.consensus.ConsensusTopicCreateTransaction,com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Transaction> builder)
        Creates and configures a new ConsensusTopicCreateTransaction for Verifiable Credentials topic in HCS. The transaction is not executed here, only upon calling execute method of the builder.
        Parameters:
        builder - The transaction builder that shall set all transaction properties, build and sign it.
        Returns:
        This identity network builder instance.

      • buildAndSignAddressBookCreateTransaction

        public HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder buildAndSignAddressBookCreateTransaction(java.util.function.Function<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.file.FileCreateTransaction,com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Transaction> builder)
        Creates and configures a new FileCreateTransaction for appnet's address book file. The transaction is not executed here, only upon calling execute method of the builder. File content is already set.
        Parameters:
        builder - The transaction builder that shall configure, build and sign given FileCreateTransaction.
        Returns:
        This identity network builder instance.

      • addAppnetDidServer

        public HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder addAppnetDidServer(java.lang.String serverUrl)
        Adds an appnet server URL that hosts DID REST API as specified by Hedera HCS DID method.
        Parameters:
        serverUrl - The URL to the appnet's server DID REST service.
        Returns:
        This identity network builder instance.

        public HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder setAppnetName(java.lang.String appnetName)
        Defines the name of the appnet for identity network address book.
        Parameters:
        appnetName - The name of the appnet.
        Returns:
        This identity network builder instance.

        public HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder setDidTopicId(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.consensus.ConsensusTopicId didTopicId)
        Sets existing HCS Topic ID to be used for DID Document messages.
        Parameters:
        didTopicId - The DID ConsensusTopicId to set.
        Returns:
        This identity network builder instance.

        Parameters:
